packages/db/src/repositories/base.reposi.description: BaseRepository class provides paginate() helper and getOrderBy() method. Repositories extend this class with table-specific CRUD and query methods.

packages/db/src/schema/prediction-market.description: Contains predictionMarket, marketPosition, marketTrade tables. Has marketPositionSideEnum (yes/no) that can be reused for PredictionVector prediction field.
